author: John Hayward, John Hayward
title: Hayward: WHO, International Bodies Must Be Purged of Chinese Communist Influence
description: We should be demanding specific measures to purge it the World Health Organization (WHO) of Chinese influence, beginning with a list of mandatory resignations topped by Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus.
content: It is very good that President Donald Trump called out the World Health Organization (WHO) for being China-centric and threatened to withhold funding, but we should be demanding specific measures to purge it of Chinese influence, beginning with a list of mand… [+7970 chars]
